description: The WinrePartitionCheck tool serves to assess the size of the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) partition. It is essential to ensure that the partition meets the minimum size requirement for security updates to install correctly. This tool can help system administrators identify if the WinRE partition is too small, which is a common issue that leads to failed updates with error code 0x80070643. Administrators can use this tool as a preliminary check before attempting to apply significant updates, such as the KB5034441 security update, to avoid unnecessary complications. Instructions for usage may be available through official Microsoft documentation or associated support channels.
